name: cyborg spider
normalized: kachikachikachikachi!
the cyborg spider gnashed its teeth and chased after us.
its eight legs scraped along the floor, making unpleasant clacking sounds.

name: tatsurou
normalized: hahh!
without looking back, i fired off a feint attack.
i couldn't scratch it with my wind.
so, i swept it away by scooping up its excessive legs with a blade of air!
gachann!
good!
the cyborg spider was thrown completely off-balance, and toppled over, making a loud sound.

name: tatsurou
normalized: one more!
this time, i slammed a mass of air against the cyborg spider, which was squirming on the floor, unable to get up right away.
bonn!
that hammer of air had blown the cyborg spider away.
it had proven fortunate that the passageway was excessively smooth.
the cyborg spider spun around and around as it slid across the floor like a curling stone.
as we thought, it was probably still in the middle of development.
it had many points of issue, like it easily toppling from the blades of wind, or not being able to stand up immediately after that.

name: shizuru
normalized: tatsurou-kun, nice!
said shizuru-san, who took the lead.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it'll come chasing after us soon.
let's hurry.
i replied, while following shizuru-san.

name: shizuru
normalized: of course!
shizuru-san was using the tree escape arts while running, and generating roses one after another.
since we had no time to avoid the security system anymore, she was covering the surveillance cameras with petals.
we would get away with not having our figures seen, but now our intrusion had been exposed to the enemy.
there was no time to waste.
and yet――

name: tatsurou
normalized: at any rate, amazing.
despite it being a time like this, i called out to shizuru-san without thinking.
her running figure, which looked like it was covered in rose petals, was extremely unreal and picturesque.

name: shizuru
normalized: eh?
what?
what's amazing?
shizuru-san looked back, while producing roses from her palms.

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san is, running surrounded by roses.
it's like a shoujo manga.

name: shizuru
normalized: fufu.
you have a lot of composure, don't you?
thanks♪
shizuru-san had plenty of composure too.
she smiled, and produced a plethora of flowers again.
all right.
it seemed that if we kept going like this, we would be able to escape, no question.
we had been able to get out of the research facility's building without much danger.
the cyborg spider had persistently chased after us, but when we got outside the facility, it had remained inside, and just watched us going out while making a weird mechanical sound.

name: shizuru
normalized: as i thought.
looks like it can't leave, huh?

name: tatsurou
normalized: as expected.
that was helpful.
it was unlikely that a weapon under development had reached the point where it could simply go outside.
even though they were separated by the forest, seishuu academy's school buildings and student dormitories were right nearby.
seishuu academy was ostensibly just an elite school.
the secretly-developed weapons could not possibly be allowed to injure its students.
in all probability, the cyborg spider would be configured to only be able to move inside the facility.
specifically because we thought that, we had prioritized avoiding conflict, and getting out of the facility one way or another.
that judgement appeared to have been correct.
however――

name: shizuru
normalized: tatsurou-kun, it looks like the next one's arrived.
shizuru-san said, in a low, quiet voice.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?!
surprised, i looked at the end point of her line of sight.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wha…?!
what was with this woman?
i doubted my own eyes.
a black figure had appeared in the moonlight.
it clearly wasn't a security guard.
it couldn't be.
it was a woman, who was clad in all-black, full-body rubber.
i didn't even know what kind of face she had.
i just knew it was a woman from her body shape.
because even her eyes and ears were completely covered by a rubber mask.
only her lips were sticking out, but she was holding an s＆m ball gag in her mouth, of all things.
her breasts and ass were voluptuous, and her figure was so magnificent that it surpassed shizuru-san's, but beyond that, she was strangeness itself.

name: shizuru
normalized: this perverted woman a friend of yours?

name: tatsurou
normalized: absolutely not.

name: shizuru
normalized: then she's an enemy, huh?
shizuru-san declared.
enemy――right, she was an enemy.
she was equipped with long metal claws on both hands, but if not for those, i wouldn't even be able to tell that she was an enemy.
wh, who the hell is this?!
a sneer.
i got the feeling that the rubber woman had laughed, still holding the gag in her mouth.
the next moment――
guwanhh!

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?!
suddenly, the rubber woman's body had gotten bigger.
no, that wasn't it.
she had moved towards us and closed the distance.
there was no buildup motion.

it felt like the rubber woman had gotten larger due to her movement, which seemed to take advantage of weak points in my sense of sight, sense of hearing, and even sense of wind―my every perceptual ability.

name: tatsurou
normalized: me?!
by the time i realized that, the all-black rubber woman was swinging her claws down toward me.
s, so fast!
could i block that with wind?!
no, that was impossible.
that would be cut through as well!
in that case!

name: tatsurou
normalized: kuahh!
i made wind spread out right in front of myself.
i slammed the defensive wind into the enemy in front of me, and was blown backward myself at the same time.
zashuu!
just as i expected, my defensive wind had been cut through, but i had been able to dodge the enemy attack at the last moment.
however, because i had dodged in such a reckless manner, my posture broke down in the blink of an eye.
i got the feeling that the rubber woman had made a derisive laugh again.
crap!
this rubber woman.
was so strong that i was no match for her.
she was coming!
was i going to be killed?

name: shizuru
normalized: ninja art “＜plant wall＞”
the one who had saved me, as i was seized by a premonition of death, was shizuru-san.
making a rustling sound, a wall of vines shot up before my eyes.
vines that had sprouted plenty of thorns.
yes!
the rubber woman rammed into it headfirst――
no, it was no use.
even though i had thought she wouldn't be able to avoid it completely, the rubber woman reacted to that instantly, and swiftly backstepped to evade the thorn wall.

name: shizuru
normalized: no way!
it seemed that even shizuru-san had thought she had definitely brought her down.
she made a surprised voice.
the disgusting rubber woman looked in shizuru-san's direction, and made a show of raising her index finger and wagging it left and right.

name: shizuru
normalized: don't make light of me, pervert woman!
under her glasses, rage flared up in shizuru-san's eyes.
shizuru-san emitted a whip-like thorny vine from her right hand.
also, it was no mere whip.
she wrapped the vine around itself over and over, and struck with what, at 20 centimetres thick, was less like a whip than a thick tree branch.
it was an object that, if hit with it directly, would pulverize the likes of a human body.
but, however!
somehow, the rubber woman had perfectly read the trajectory of the thorny-vine branch-whip, which curved at a high speed, and jumped on that vine to dodge it.
dogahh!
having lost its target, the thorny vine futilely destroyed the ground that the rubber woman had been standing on until just before, with a thunderous noise.
and then, the rubber woman dashed across the branch-whip, and closed the distance from shizuru-san in an instant.

name: shizuru
normalized: wha?!
shizuru-san appeared to have been caught completely off-guard.
like i was going to let her do that!

name: tatsurou
normalized: don't underestimate me!
i had been saved by shizuru-san just before.
this time, it was my turn to cover for her.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wind escape, whirlwind slash!
a sudden gust of wind was generated from my palms.
the air swirled violently, and attacked the rubber woman.
at the centre of the whisked air, countless vacuum blades cut the rubber woman to pieces.
or should have.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wha?!
the rubber woman quickly swung her left and right claws, still on top of the thorny vine.
bashubashubashubashuu!
a strange noise that sounded like high-pitched clapping resounded around the rubber woman.
it was the sound of the vacuums i had created being extinguished one after another.
i couldn't see it with my eyes, but she had cut through the vacuum blades, of which even i, who had unleashed them, didn't know how many there were.
unbelievable!
is she a monster?!

name: shizuru
normalized: kuhh!
even so, it looked like it had been enough to save shizuru-san.
shizuru-san had immediately released the vine-whip that the rubber woman was on, and taken a great distance.

name: shizuru
normalized: this pervert woman is strong…?!
shizuru-san's voice was shaking.
it was the first time i'd seen shizuru-san's face like that.
that was natural.
infiltration-type taimanin were not suited for combat, and that rubber woman overwhelmed both of us.
she may have been a pervert, but she was no ordinary person.
was the security of this place so light because this woman was here?!

name: shizuru
normalized: tch… i've been hit.
shizuru-san groaned softly.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?
i reflexively looked at shizuru-san in surprise.
in front of this monster, that was a mistake, but, perhaps because she believed she could bring the likes of us down at any time, the rubber woman didn't move.
a streak of blood was dripping from shizuru-san's right arm.
she had taken damage just now?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san?!

name: shizuru
normalized: it's all right.
i was only scratched…
shizuru-san answered firmly, but her body was starting to tremble slightly.
a bad feeling spread through me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san, it couldn't be…?!

name: shizuru
normalized: this is just the worst.
looks like this pervert woman's claws are poisoned, huh?
shizuru-san said, self-deprecatingly.
shit, she had been hit.

name: shizuru
normalized: uuh… ku… uu…
sweat suddenly oozed out from shizuru-san's entire body.
her face was red, as if it had caught fire.
it was poison.
she had unmistakably been poisoned.

name: tatsurou
normalized: kuh…
there was an overwhelming difference in ability.
on top of that, shizuru-san had been afflicted by a poison.
what do i do?!
how do i get through this?!
what should i do?!
there was no time to be hesitating.
furthermore, the voices and presence of humans were approaching from the forest.
since we had ended up triggering the security system when we came out of the facility, the guards had come running in a hurry.
we could not afford to get caught here.
however, it would be impossible for me to oppose that rubber woman and the guards by myself.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （kuh… is it all over…?
then, suddenly, the rubber woman took an unexpected action.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?

name: shizuru
normalized: wh, why…?!
the rubber woman, who seemed to be driving us into a corner, had run off in the opposite direction to the one from which the guards were coming.

name: tatsurou
normalized: is she not washizu material's assassin?!

name: shizuru
normalized: kuh…

name: tatsurou
normalized: shizuru-san!
i rushed over to shizuru-san, who fell to her knees.
i didn't know the reason, but there was no time to think about it.
this was a golden chance.
it might have been a trap, but it was better than staying here.

name: tatsurou
normalized: sorry!
i lifted up the body of shizuru-san, who seemed to be in pain.

name: shizuru
normalized: tatsurou-kun?!
like a princess.
shizuru-san looked at me like she was bewildered.

name: tatsurou
normalized: we're getting out of here.
hold on!

name: shizuru
normalized: kuh, okay… if you would…
shizuru-san clung to me with shaking hands.
i began to flee, in a different direction than the one in which the rubber woman had disappeared, or the one from which the guards were coming.
